page.title: 03Changes in Kirkby
page.content: Our class interviewed 100 people about the changes there have been in our town. A lot of people said the {shopping precinct}had been built but all the{railways}but one had been closed down. {The Festival Hall}has been repaired. Three people mentioned that Bentinck House had been knocked down and in place houses had been built by Rippon Homes. Things have got busier in Kirkby, with{traffic}getting heavier. One lady said "There only used to be a pony and trap!" There are more factories and industrial{estates. } {Two schools}have been built recently; one of them is Ashfield Comprehensive. {Leisure facilities}aren't so common in Kirkby but new equipment was recently put up on Titchfield Park.
